questions.question_text: What information is flushed when the chunk-size value is changed in the config dlp settings?

choices.D: The file name patterns in the DLP filters
choices.A: The database for DLP document fingerprinting
choices.B: The supported file types in the DLP filters

questions.question_text: Which of the following statements is true regarding the use of a PAC file to configure the web proxy settings in an Internet browser? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
PAC file can contain different proxy destinations. PAC file cannot control whether filtering is enabled on a fortigate.

choices.C: Can contain a list of URLs that will be exempted from the FortiGate web filtering inspection.
choices.A: More than one proxy is supported.
choices.D: Can contain a list of users that will be exempted from the use of any proxy.
choices.B: Can contain a list of destinations that will be exempt from the use of any proxy.

choices.A: A service that provides a digital certificate each time a user is authenticating
choices.C: The FortiGate process in charge of generating digital certificates on the fly for SSL inspection purposes
choices.D: A service that validates digital certificates for certificate-based authentication purposes
choices.B: An entity that certifies that the information contained in a digital certificate is valid and true.

questions.question_text: Which of the following statements best describes what a Public Certificate Authority (CA) is?
Which of the following statements best describes what a Certificate Signing Request (CSR) is?

choices.A: A message sent by the Certificate Authority (CA) that contains a signed digital certificate.
choices.B: An enquiry submitted to a Certificate Authority (CA) to request a root CA certificate
choices.D: An enquiry submitted to a Certificate Authority (CA) to request a Certificate Revocation List (CRL)
choices.C: An enquiry submitted to a Certificate Authority (CA) to request a signed digital certificate

questions.question_text:
Examine the exhibit, which contains a virtual IP and a firewall policy configuration.
//IMG//

The WAN(port1) interface has the IP address 10.200.1.1/24. The LAN(port2) interface has the IP address 10.0.1.254/24.
The top firewall policy has NAT enabled using outgoing interface address. The second firewall policy configured with a virtual IP (VIP) as the destination address.
Which IP address will be used to source NAT the Internet traffic coming from a workstation with the IP address 10.0.1.10/24?

choices.C: Any available IP address in the WAN(port1) subnet 10.200.1.0/24

discussion.content: Warning - in my exam I have this question but with one more screenshot with detail of NAT - overload NAT with IP pool 10.200.1.100 (I'm not sure about this IP) - in this case is A not correct answer
Question is about source NAT so IP 10.200.1.1 is correct - option A
